name: Clockwork
description: php dev tools in your browser

scripts.build-chrome: vite build && del-cli dist/chrome && move-cli --mkdirp build dist/chrome && cpx 'platforms/chrome/**/*' dist/chrome/
scripts.build-chrome-dev: vite build --mode=development && del-cli dist/chrome && move-cli --mkdirp build dist/chrome && cpx 'platforms/chrome/**/*' dist/chrome/
scripts.build-edge: vite build && del-cli dist/edge && move-cli --mkdirp build dist/edge && cpx 'platforms/edge/**/*' dist/edge/
scripts.build-edge-dev: vite build --mode=development && del-cli dist/edge && move-cli --mkdirp build dist/edge && cpx 'platforms/edge/**/*' dist/edge/
scripts.build-firefox: vite build && del-cli dist/firefox && move-cli --mkdirp build dist/firefox && cpx 'platforms/firefox/**/*' dist/firefox/
scripts.build-firefox-dev: vite build --mode=development && del-cli dist/firefox && move-cli --mkdirp build dist/firefox && cpx 'platforms/firefox/**/*' dist/firefox/
scripts.build-share: VUE_APP_PLATFORM=share vite build && del-cli dist/share && move-cli --mkdirp build dist/share
scripts.build-share-dev: VUE_APP_PLATFORM=share vite build --mode=development && del-cli dist/share && move-cli --mkdirp build dist/share
scripts.build-web: vite build && del-cli dist/web && move-cli --mkdirp build dist/web
scripts.build-web-dev: vite build --mode=development && del-cli dist/web && move-cli --mkdirp build dist/web
